description: A regular expression to match all Emoji-only symbols as per the Unicode Standard.

name: emoji-regex

scripts.build: rm -rf -- es2015; babel src -d .; NODE_ENV=es2015 babel src -d ./es2015; cp src/RGI_Emoji-pattern.txt .; node script/inject-sequences.js
